long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clean up your Twitter feed with our intelligent spam filter extension. This tool helps you focus on meaningful content by automatically hiding tweets from potential spam accounts and letting you customize what appears in your feed.

* Key Features:

- Automatically detects and hides posts (tweets) from suspected bot accounts
- Filter tweets containing specific phrases or keywords
- Customizable filters for stock spam and promotional content
- Easy-to-use interface with toggle controls for different filter types
- Zero impact on X's performance
- Works with both X.com and Twitter.com 
- Respects your privacy - no data collection

* How It Works:

- Install the extension and click its icon to access settings
- Enable the filters you want to use
- Add custom phrases or keywords to filter (optional)
- Browse Twitter with a cleaner, spam-free feed

* Perfect for:

- Regular X (Twitter) users tired of spam
- Investors avoiding stock spam bots
- Anyone seeking a cleaner social media experience
